Below 70 / ‚ÄúGrade Pending‚Äù / ‚ÄúClosed‚Äù
‚Ä¢	Poor sanitary conditions
‚Ä¢	The restaurant failed inspection or is awaiting a reinspection after receiving low marks.
‚Ä¢	‚ÄúGrade Pending‚Äù means the restaurant is challenging its score or waiting for re-evaluation.
‚Ä¢	‚ÄúClosed‚Äù means it was shut down until serious health hazards are fixed (e.g., pests, sewage, or foodborne illness risk).

Debajo de 70 / ‚ÄúCalificaci√≥n pendiente‚Äù / ‚ÄúCerrado‚Äù
‚Ä¢	Condiciones sanitarias deficientes
‚Ä¢	El restaurante no pas√≥ la inspecci√≥n o est√° esperando una reinspecci√≥n despu√©s de recibir una calificaci√≥n baja.
‚Ä¢	‚ÄúCalificaci√≥n pendiente‚Äù significa que el restaurante est√° impugnando su puntuaci√≥n o esperando una nueva evaluaci√≥n.
